item.title: Loubna add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Loubna add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid." -- John Wayne

item.title: Loubna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "We'll be Friends Forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. Even longer,' Pooh answered." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Alexia Purdy
item.description: "The only battle that matters is the one within." -- Alexia Purdy

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nikolai Gogol, in The Government Inspector presented by the EGBA and performed by the ORAD
item.description: "I am who I am and that's who I am" -- Nikolai Gogol, in The Government Inspector presented by the EGBA and performed by the ORAD

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Angelina Jolie
item.description: "If you ask people what they've always wanted to do, most people haven't done it. That breaks my heart." -- Angelina Jolie

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Harriet Beecher Stowe
item.description: "The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone." -- Harriet Beecher Stowe

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I finally understood what true love meant...love meant that you care for another person's happiness more than your own, no matter how painful the choices you face might be." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are the answer to every prayer I've offered. You are a song, a dream, a whisper, and I don't know how I could have lived without you for as long as I have." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "True love is rare, and it's the only thing that gives life real meaning." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Dreams are always crushing when they don't come true. But it's the simple dreams that are often the most painful because they seem so personal, so reasonable, so attainable. You're always close enough to touch, but never quite close enough to hold and it's enough to break your heart." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with her in the years we were apart." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "The saddest people I've ever met in life are the ones who don't care deeply about anything at all. Passion and satisfaction go hand in hand, and without them, any happiness is only temporary, because there's nothing to make it last." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "When I look in the mirror, I know I’m looking at someone who isn’t sure she deserves to be loved at all." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it..." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "In our time together, you claimed a special place in my heart, one I'll carry with me forever and that no one can ever replace." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "One ought to hold on to one's heart; for if one lets it go, one soon loses control of the head too." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Sara Teasdale
item.description: "It is strange how often a heart must be broken before the years can make it wise." -- Sara Teasdale

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I could easily forgive his pride, if he had not mortified mine." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Without you in my arms, I feel an emptiness in my soul. I find myself searching the crowds for your face - I know it's an impossibility, but I cannot help myself." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Loubna add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "No one ever told me that grief felt so like fear." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Grief can be a burden, but also an anchor. You get used to the weight, how it holds you in place." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Loubna add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Ho! Ho! Ho! To the bottle I go To heal my heart and drown my woe Rain may fall, and wind may blow And many miles be still to go But under a tall tree will I lie And let the clouds go sailing by" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Nothing thicker than a knife's blade separates happiness from melancholy." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Loubna add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
